title: Yatra discount coupons (Luke M Murray)
text: By Luke M Murray Sep 4, 2015 Yatra.com was launched in Aug 2006. When its about travelling, there is no other brand as trusted as Yatra in India. It is the leading provider of consumer direct travel services in India. Yatra has won many awards for it excellence in the field. These awards include 'Outstanding performance as a Domestic Tour Operator (Rest Of India)', 'Outstanding performance as a Domestic Tour Operator in Jammu and Kashmir' and 'Outstanding performance as an Inbound Tour Operator-Cat C'amogst many other awards. Use Yatra discount coupons , yatra discount coupon to get hotel booking and Flight bookings done at cheaper prices.The company is based in Gurgaon, India. Yatra.com is a one stop solution for all travel related services and a leading consolidator of travel products. Yatra.com provides its customers with largest reservation services in top hotels, with about 36000 hotels in India and about 500,000 hotels across the globe.With about 20,000 domestic tickets and 7500 hotels and holiday packages a day Yatra.com has created new heights in the travel industry. Yatra.com promises its customers the best travel experience. The sole motive of Yatra.com is "Creating Happy Travellers". Yatra.com provides all kind of information to its customers and travellers. Information regarding prices, availability, booking facility for domestic and international air travel, hotel bookings, holiday packages, bus and railway reservation etc. is also provided by Yatra.com and hence, Yatra.com answers all your queries regarding travel. In just over 8 years, Yatra has made 3 acquisitions namely ticket consolidator Travel Services International (TSI) in October 2010, global distribution system (GDS) provider MagicRooms.in, and Indian events and entertainment portal BuzzInTown.com in July 2012 and in 2012, Yatra.com has a 100% stake in Travelguru.com.Customers and travellers can anytime check the information and can do the reservation from their user friendly website Yatra.com, mobile optimized WAP site and mobile app. Yatra.com is user friendly to all the travellers hailing from different states with a multi lingual call centre which works 24*7. Yatra.com also has a countrywide network of Holiday Lounges and Yatra Travel Express Stores. Yatra.com provides the best packages and deals at the most discounted rates for exotic national and international destinations. In case you feel like cancelling the booking Yatra.com gives you an option for cancellation of booking too. The "My booking Section" will allow you to check the cancellation charges and cancel your hotel booking online. You will get the refund within a few days of cancellation as the team will process your refund from their end just within few hours of getting a cancellation request. There are easy payment options on Yatra.com for all the travel enthusiasts. Customers and travellers can pay via credit card, debit card, net banking. In case you want to know about the promotional emails you can register for promotional emails from Yatra.com. The promotions are also shared with customers through banners on the website. So next timewhen you plan for an exotic holiday go to Yatra.com for the amazing packages and great deals at the most reasonable rates.To get more travel discount coupons, please visit http://www.couponsculture.com/.
